metadata.title: New Charms Italian Charm Tool for Italian Charm Bracelet Links - Double Sided
features: Compatible with all major brands of Italian Charms.
Works with standard size 9mm Italian Charms.
description: This Italian Charm tool will help you attach charms to your charm bracelet. Once you slide the end of the tool into the charm to turn it and it opens your charm. Once your charm is open you can attach the next charm to it and customize your bracelet in a snap!
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item model number": "Tool", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "February 6, 2012", "Manufacturer": "New Charms"}
